linefit

Class SpreadSheetAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • linefit.SpreadSheetAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SpreadSheetAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    ExcelAdapter enables Copy-Paste Clipboard functionality on JTables. The clipboard data format used by the adapter is compatible with the clipboard format used by Excel. This provides for clipboard interoperability between enabled JTables and Excel. This code is based on the ExcelAdapter from JavaWorld and is used per their (IDG) copyright policy as of 2015 and has since been modified by Covenant College Students to work with other platforms http://www.javaworld.com/article/2077579/learn-java/java-tip-77--enable-copy-and-paste-functionality-between-swing-s-jtables-and-excel.html Allowed use of source code from http://www.javaworld.com/about/copyright.html on 2/16/2015 copied below for convenience: Permissions Content derived from JavaWorld may be reproduced in print or displayed online and distributed, for free, in limited quantities for nonprofit, educational purposes with proper attribution. IDG retains the copyright for any such use. Any use of whole or partial JavaWorld content intended to endorse a product or for other commercial use must be approved by a JavaWorld editor. Requests will be acted on quickly. For any commercial reproduction of JavaWorld content, print or online, you must purchase a reprint.
    Since:
    <0.98.0
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Ashok Banerjee, Jignesh Mehta and Keith Rice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      The action listener that is triggered when one of our defined keystrokes are pressed which then calls an appropriate function to do the work
      void copy()
      Copies the data so that it is in the standard spreadsheet format
      void delete()
      Deletes all the selected data and sets it to null so we don't read it as data
      void paste()
      Pastes the data from our clipboard into our table
